title: All Eyes on Ether: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 4, 2025

title: Malaysian Forms Air and Ground Task Force to Shutdown 14,000 BTC Mining Rigs
contentSnippet: Authorities released a report revealing 14,000 illegal bitcoin miners siphoned electricity from the national grid worth $1.1 billion since 2020.

title: XRP's price beginning to show promise above $2.15: Here’s why
contentSnippet: XRP’s macro outlook remained bullish, with onchain data showing that a breakout was possible if key price support levels were reclaimed.

title: Solana’s Drift Launches v3, With 10x Faster Trades
contentSnippet: With v3, the team says that about 85% of market orders will fill in under half a second, and liquidity will deepen enough to bring slippage on larger trades down to around 0.02%.

title: Axelar Unveils AgentFlux to Bring AI Agents OnChain, Without Cloud Risks
contentSnippet: Developed by Interop Labs, AgentFlux lets financial firms deploy “agentic” automation without sending sensitive information to external infrastructure.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Holds Near Weekly High, Altcoins Remain Subdued
contentSnippet: Bitcoin steadied near weekly highs as concerns ease, but most altcoins remain weak. Market shows early signs of recovery despite broader downtrends.

title: CoinDCX report shows Indian users moving to broader crypto portfolios in 2025
contentSnippet: CoinDCX’s Sumit Gupta said crypto is becoming a natural extension of traditional investing as Indian traders mature.

title: Bitcoin-Focused Firm Twenty One Sees Public NYSE Listing on Dec. 9
contentSnippet: The firm offers public equity exposure to bitcoin, focusing on "capital-efficient bitcoin accumulation" and Bitcoin ecosystem services.

title: CZ’s YZi ramps up prediction market bet as Opinion claims 40% share
contentSnippet: The YZi Labs-backed “Opinion” prediction market logged $1.5 billion in weekly volume just weeks after launch, outpacing Kalshi and Polymarket as prediction markets boom.

title: Plume Brings Institutional RWA Yield to Solana With Debut of Nest Vaults
contentSnippet: Plume is bringing real-world yield to Solana with the rollout of its Nest vaults, giving the network’s users direct access to on-chain credit, Treasuries and receivables.

title: Bitcoin ATM Operator Coinme Ordered to Return Over $8M to Customers
contentSnippet: The Seattle-based Bitcoin ATM operator faces revocation of its license after allegedly claiming unredeemed customer vouchers as income.

title: Grayscale Chainlink ETF draws $41M on debut, but not ‘blockbuster’
contentSnippet: Analysts called the Chainlink ETF’s debut a “solid” launch, but the development has yet to attract enough liquidity to reverse the LINK token’s 39% decline over the past year.

title: Citadel Challenges DeFi Framework in Letter to SEC, Sparking Industry Outrage
contentSnippet: A Citadel Securities letter to the SEC argues that some DeFi systems resemble traditional exchanges and should face comparable oversight.

title: Bitcoin Policy Institute calls for Samourai pardon as petition tops 3,200
contentSnippet: A Washington think tank and prominent Bitcoiners say jailing the Samourai Wallet developers for an “unlicensed money transmitter” conspiracy criminalizes non-custodial code.

title: ING Flags Upside Potential in 10-Year U.S. Treasury Yield
contentSnippet: "Treasuries love that 4% to 4.1% trading range. Temporary break below more likely. But break above has more legs," the Dutch bank said.

title: MUFGグループ、トークン化MMFの商品化へ Progmatと協業開始
contentSnippet: 2026年に機関投資家向け提供を目指す三菱UFJアセットマネジメント、三菱UFJモルガン・スタンレー証券、三菱UFJ信託銀行の3社は4日、Progmat（プログマ）との協業を発表した。日本初となるトークン化投資信託の商品化に向け、基盤整備を...

title: FRB利下げと流動性回復、2026年の仮想通貨市場の追い風か＝Delphi Digitalレポート
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨リサーチ企業Delphi Digitalは、FRBの利下げ継続とQT終了、TGA取り崩し、RRP枯渇により、2026年に仮想通貨市場にとって追い風となる流動性環境が生まれると分析。ビットコインやイーサリアムなどデジタル資産に有利との見方を示した。

title: CZ Teases New BNB Chain Native Prediction Market Predict.Fun
contentSnippet: Predict.fun aims to fix prediction markets’ biggest inefficiency, user funds sitting idle for weeks or months without earning yield, while tapping the large userbase of BNB Chain.

title: Citadel causes uproar for urging SEC to regulate DeFi tokenized stocks
contentSnippet: Citadel Securities argued that DeFi platforms offering tokenized US stocks should be regulated under securities laws and not get exemptive relief from the SEC.

title: ランボルギーニとレジャー、限定ウォレット発表　「いつランボ買える」ミームに呼応
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ハードウェアウォレット大手レジャーとイタリア高級車ランボルギーニが提携し、限定版「Ledger Stax」を2026年初頭に発売。フェラーリやポルシェなど高級ブランドのWeb3参入が加速する中、24万人超の仮想通貨ミリオネア増加が背景に。

title: Bitcoin may see ‘relief bounce’ as stabilization signs emerge: Analysts
contentSnippet: Bitfinex says “extreme deleveraging” and other indicators as factors that could help Bitcoin hold its ground and potentially move higher.

title: Ukrainian Police Arrest Two in Alleged Crypto Extortion Murder
contentSnippet: Europe accounts for over 30% of nearly 70 wrench attacks documented this year as crypto-fueled violence surges across the continent.

title: Ledger says popular chip used on Solana phones vulnerable to unstoppable attack
contentSnippet: Ledger says it was able to gain “full and absolute control” over a smartphone by using electromagnetic pulses to take over its chip.

title: Ethereum Price Swells as Fusaka Upgrade Goes Live
contentSnippet: Fusaka represents what some describe as Ethereum’s first real step into key data sampling and capacity mechanisms it has sought for a decade.

title: 米コネチカット州がロビンフッドなど3社に停止命令、無免許でスポーツ賭博提供と主張
contentSnippet: コネチカット州消費者保護局がロビンフッド、クリプトドットコム、カルシに無免許オンライン賭博運営の停止命令を発行した。3社は州法に違反してスポーツ賭博を提供しており、利用者の資金や情報にリスクをもたらしているという。

title: Connecticut orders Robinhood, Crypto.com, Kalshi to stop prediction markets
contentSnippet: Connecticut has sent cease and desist letters to Robinhood, Crypto.com and Kalshi, claiming the platforms' event contracts are unlicensed sports betting.

title: Bitcoin Short Positions Build Ahead of Potential Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is trading in a narrow band ahead of the Fed's rate decision, with more than $6 billion in leveraged positions at risk.

title: Crypto Is Edging Further Into Mainstream Finance, BlackRock and Coinbase Chiefs Say
contentSnippet: BlackRock and Coinbase executives discussed Bitcoin, U.S. legislation, tokenization, and market trends on during a joint interview.

title: チャールズ・シュワブ、2026年前半に仮想通貨取引開始へ　既存取引所に手数料圧力か
contentSnippet: 米大手証券チャールズ・シュワブが2026年前半にビットコインとイーサリアムのスポット取引を開始。低手数料戦略で既存取引所に圧力か。バンガードやバンク・オブ・アメリカも参入し、ウォール街で仮想通貨の主流化が加速。

title: IREN stock rebounds following $3.6B debt and equity fundraising move
contentSnippet: IREN closed trading on Wednesday up nearly 7%, slightly recovering from a major drop on Tuesday after sharing plans for its latest capital raising effort.

title: メタマスク、最大1万ドルの損失を補償する「トランザクション・シールド」開始
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレット「メタマスク」が有料補償サービス「トランザクション・シールド」を開始。対象となる取引について月額9.99ドルで最大1万ドルの損失を補償する。

title: Connecticut Orders Kalshi, Robinhood, and Crypto.com to Halt 'Unlicensed' Online Gambling
contentSnippet: State regulators have issued cease-and-desist letters alleging that the platforms offered illegal sports-event contracts to Connecticut users.

title: NTT Digital、仮想通貨ソラナのバリデータを運用開始
contentSnippet: NTTドコモグループのNTT DigitalがSolanaバリデータ運用を開始。Dawn Labsが技術支援を担う。国内ではモブキャストHDもソラナ財団認定を取得するなど、企業参入が加速している。

title: 三井物産デジタルAM、デジタル証券ファンドを早期償還
contentSnippet: 三井物産デジタル・アセットマネジメントは、デジタル証券ファンド「日本橋・人形町」を早期償還し、当初予想3.0%を上回る年5.0%の利回りを達成。累計利益分配金は25億円を突破した。

title: 「バイナンス・ジュニア」、キッズ向け仮想通貨口座導入　安全性に関する議論も
contentSnippet: バイナンスが6～17歳向けの仮想通貨プログラム「バイナンス・ジュニア」を開始した。親の監督下でシンプルアーンによる資産運用などが可能となる。

title: イーサリアム保有企業購入量、ピークから80%急減　ビットワイズが指摘
contentSnippet: ビットワイズの報告によると、イーサリアム保有企業の11月購入量は8月比81%減の37万ETHに急減。一方、ビットマイン社は12月に1.5億ドル相当を追加購入し、フサカアップグレードへの期待を示した。

title: Ledger Finds Popular Smartphone Chip Vulnerable to Unpatchable Attacks
contentSnippet: A report by the provider of crypto wallets shows that a Mediatek Dimensity 7300 chip could be compromised at its lowest level.

title: High-Leveraged Crypto ETF Applications on Hold After SEC Warnings
contentSnippet: Leveraged crypto and other ETFs already exist for U.S. investors, but the SEC wants issuers to address risk concerns over proposed products.

title: BlackRock Remains Risk-on as ‘Mega Forces’ Like AI, Stablecoins Transform Financial Markets
contentSnippet: Global investment firm BlackRock is staying risk-on and overweight U.S. equities as AI leads market forces heading into 2026.

title: Binance Unveils New Crypto Savings Account for Kids
contentSnippet: Binance Junior accounts will be limited to moving funds back to parent accounts or to other Junior accounts, with on-chain withdrawals unavailable.
